name: Poker Poker Magic
summary: Embark on a magical journey with Caroline and Clovis in "Poker Poker Magic," a delightful 1v1 puzzle/action game for Playdate. Join Caroline, a spirited yet somewhat absent-minded magician-in-training, and her trusty dove, Ceres, as they set out to find a magical hat that could help Caroline ace her end-of-year exams at the Robert Houdin School of Prestidigitation. Little do they know, their adventure will lead them into a whimsical forest filled with colorful characters, including a clown, a four-eared rabbit, and a horse prince, each providing opportunities for thrilling magical duels.
